definition: classics/sacred book/scripture/to pass through/to undergo/to bear/to endure/warp (textile)/longitude/menstruation/channel (TCM)/abbr. for economics 經濟|经济[jing1 ji4]

sentences.english: Electroplated copper shell can be used for many years.
Durable, adopting auto painting process of imported car.
sentences.chinese: 採用進口轎車噴漆工藝，經久耐用。

sentences.english: There was prolonged applause when he began to speak.
sentences.chinese: 他開始講話時響起了經久不息的掌聲。

sentences.english: Third, set off firecrackers and the customs temporary enduring a tradition.
sentences.chinese: 第三，放鞭炮也是我國習俗傍邊經久不衰的一項傳統。

sentences.english: And that's a perennial issue in philosophy.
sentences.chinese: 這在哲學上也是一個經久不衰的問題。

sentences.english: But now, your comedy can live on forever.
sentences.chinese: 但是現在，你的喜劇能夠經久不衰。

sentences.english: Celanese's pure acrylic emulsions are the foundation for durable exterior paints.
sentences.chinese: 塞拉尼斯純丙烯酸乳液是外牆塗料經久耐用的基礎。

sentences.english: High speed high efficiency. Easy to operate, long-service and endurance.
sentences.chinese: 高速度，高效率，操作簡便，經久耐用。

sentences.english: Temples and statues decay, but books survieve.
sentences.chinese: 寺廟會倒坍，神像會朽爛，而書卻經久長存。

sentences.english: A good shingle roof is a most durable type of roof.
sentences.chinese: 用優質木瓦蓋的屋頂是一種經久耐用的屋頂。

sentences.english: It is not difficult to find the reasons for their enduring appeal.
sentences.chinese: 找到其吸引力能經久不衰的原因並不難。

sentences.english: This is because these are more affordable and some are even more durable.
sentences.chinese: 這是因爲他們更加的價廉物美，更加經久耐用。

sentences.english: Increase productivity with speedy relocation. Two castors and two wheels for easily move.
sentences.chinese: 外形簡單大方，經久耐用，兩個腳輪，可方便地移動。

sentences.english: It has been one of the most enduring genres in the business.
sentences.chinese: 這是影視業中最經久不衰的類型之一。

sentences.english: When he got up to reply there was long applause.
sentences.chinese: 他站起來回答時，響起經久不息的掌聲。

sentences.english: Airlines recommend hard-sided cases for durability.
sentences.chinese: 航空公司推薦使用硬邊箱，因其經久耐用。
